title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: When using JDK 1.4, the All types dialog in the application displays obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc. These classes are shown prominently in the dialog.
OB: These obfuscated classes are highly visible in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be displayed with less prominence in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application using JDK 1.4. 
2. Open the All types dialog. 
3. Observe that obfuscated classes (e.g., 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') are displayed prominently.
